provisions.title: Establishment of the Tree Crops Development Authority
provisions.content: (1) There is established by this Act, the Tree Crops Development Authority as a body corporate with perpetual succession. There is established by this Act, the Tree Crops Development Authority as a body corporate with perpetual succession. (2) For the performance of the functions of the Authority, the Authority may acquire and hold property, dispose of property and enter into a contract or any other related transaction. For the performance of the functions of the Authority, the Authority may acquire and hold property, dispose of property and enter into a contract or any other related transaction. (3) Where there is a hindrance to the acquisition of immovable property, the immovable property may be acquired for the Authority under the State Lands Act, 1962 (Act 125) and the cost shall be borne by the Authority. provisions.title: Object of the Authority
provisions.content: The object of the Authority is to regulate and develop in a sustainable environment the production, processing and trading of tree crops. The object of the Authority is to regulate and develop in a sustainable environment the production, processing and trading of tree crops.

provisions.content: To achieve the object, the Authority shall promote and support the development of the tree crops industry; promote and support the development of the tree crops industry; undertake, assist and encourage scientific, technological and economic research in tree crops; improve the trading of tree crops; improve the trading of tree crops; register or license actors engaged in the tree crops value chain; register or license actors engaged in the tree crops value chain; provisions.title: Meetings of the Board
provisions.content: (1) The Board shall meet at least every three months for the despatch of business at a time and place determined by the chairperson. The Board shall meet at least every three months for the despatch of business at a time and place determined by the chairperson. provisions.title: Establishment of Tree Crops Fund
provisions.content: There is established by this Act, the Tree Crops Fund referred to in this Act as the Fund. There is established by this Act, the Tree Crops Fund referred to in this Act as the Fund.

provisions.content: The object of the Fund is to provide for both capital and recurrent expenditure for the development of the tree crops industry. The object of the Fund is to provide for both capital and recurrent expenditure for the development of the tree crops industry.

provisions.content: The sources of money for the Fund include moneys approved by Parliament; moneys approved by Parliament; internally generated funds; internally generated funds; grants, gifts and donations; grants, gifts and donations; loans; and loans; and subscriptions by various stakeholders in the tree crops industry. subscriptions by various stakeholders in the tree crops industry.
